info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 7:29PM CDT until May 13 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Callahan County in west central Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 728 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clyde, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Baird around 740 PM CDT. Putnam around 815 PM CDT. Atwell around 830 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Admiral and I-20 Near The Callahan-Eastland County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 293 and 323. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
